cause.description:
Man up and take a joke.
Everyone is so damn serious all the time.
Loosen up kids.
1. You're way too serious, damn.
2. Life can not be taken too seriously, or you will have 7 years bad luck. Just like if you break a mirror, duh.
3. Get naked...
4. Are you naked yet?
cause.mission: Stop the negative connotation associated with a dry sense of humor
cause.name: SAVE SARCASM
